name: Abduction (CondorBoH)
description:
You play as a UFO abducting cows. Use arrow keys to angle the UFO. Press/Hold spacebar to launch yourself in the direction facing. The more you hold, the more power you are launched at. But there is limited fuel. Things that look like fuel tanks give fuel, other UFOs give unlimited fuel. Running into planes reduces fuel and hitting clouds bounces the UFOs.

This was an assessment for college. High Score may not work.
